product_name: Leki Corklite Antishock Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: These all-around trekking poles combine edge-free grips with a hybrid locking system and antishock tips for hassle-free lengthening and all-day comfort, no matter how rugged your terrain becomes.
short_description: These all-around trekking poles combine edge-free grips with a hybrid locking system and antishock tips for hassle-free lengthening and all-day comfort, no matter how rugged your terrain becomes.
